name: Stephen Thornhill
goal: Consultancy on agri-food and biofuel markets and policy, rural and international development and bioenergy and biowaste issues from a socio-economic perspective.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Development, Energy, Environment, Humanitarian Aid, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: EU Common Agricultural Policy, EU Trade Policy, EU Renewable Energy Directives, EU Circular Economy and Waste Directives, EU International Development Issues
